dialogue:
[header name:Worried Adult]
Are you well rested for the journey?

[newpage wait:1.2]
[header name:Worried Adult]
Remember that when you run out of cards, [pause value:.25]
to shuffle your [color value:red]backbuffer[color value:regular] into your [color value:blue]buffer[color value:regular] you'll need [color value:pp]Play Points(PP).[endl][color value:regular][pause value:.25]


[newpage wait:3.3]
[header name:Worried Adult]
You can check how much [color value:pp]PP[color value:regular] you have left at the bottom left,[pause value:.3] at the ring inside your buffer.

[newpage wait:3.7]
[header name:Worried Adult]
You can get some of my[endl][color value:pp]food
[color value:regular] [style value:wave][sprite id:food/scale:.7][style value:none] if you need to 
 replenish some...
name: Adult 1
